Sample disease activity levels and HAQ

Source: R/pop.R
sample_rtmvnorm_da.Rd

Sample disease activity levels and HAQ from a truncated multivariate normal distribution.

sample_rtmvnorm_da(n, mean, sigma, lower, upper)

Arguments

n

Number of samples.
mean

Mean vector.
sigma

Covariance matrix.
lower

Vector of lower truncation points.
upper

Vector of upper truncation points.
